text: mūsā tam camūkattāriṭam ḥpir'avṉuṭaiya kūṭṭattāriṭamiruntu (allāh) uṅkaḷaik kāppāṟṟiya pōtu, allāh uṅkaḷukkup purinta aruḷ koṭaiyai niṉaittup pāruṅkaḷ; avarkaḷō, uṅkaḷaik koṭiya vētaṉaiyāl tuṉpuṟuttiyatuṭaṉ, uṅkaḷuṭaiya āṇ kuḻantaikaḷai aṟut(tuk kolai cey)tum uṅkaḷ peṇmakkaḷai (maṭṭum) uyiruṭaṉ viṭṭuk koṇṭum iruntārkaḷ - itil uṅkaḷ iṟaivaṉiṭamiruntu uṅkaḷukku makattāṉa cōtaṉai (ēṟpaṭṭu) iruntatu" eṉṟu kūṟiṉār
